item.description:
CANCELLED DUE TO RAIN

Hi....

Now that the weather is nice, I was hoping to play once a week.  I am a beginner but would love to play with anyone and everyone.  I thought I would schedule a meetup this Wednesday at the Hamden High School tennis courts.  Would love for anyone to join me to hit a few balls around.

Also, as I mentioned to a few of you today, I am volunteering at the Special Olympics Tennis event on Sunday, June 9th from 8:30 - 12pm.  This volunteer opportunity is through ESPN.  If anyone is interested in volunteering, please let me know/contact me.  The deadline to let me know is by next Friday, May 17th.  The volunteer location will be at Southern CT State University.  You can volunteer as a ball runner, timer, counter, hugger and/or as an award presenter.  I am volunteering as a ball runner and hugger.  You can volunteer anytime between 8:30am-4pm.  I opted to volunteer from 8:30am-12pm.  Let me know if you are interested and we can always car pool or you can meet me there.  I need to know for sure by the end of next week/May 17th so I can let the volunteer coordinator at ESPN know.  Thought this would be fitting to post it on this site.  I hope to see a lot of interest from all you tennis lovers.  Thank you in advance!

Swadhi

P.S.  It looks like it may rain on Wednesday.  If the forecast still predicts rain on Wednesday, I will update the website and cancel this meetup Tuesday evening. CANCELLED DUE TO RAIN

group.name: Tennis Meetup of New Haven and Fairfield Counties

item.name: Cancelled Due To Rain - Hamden High School - Week Night Tennis 7pm
